name: tm67
effect: Teaches Recycle to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Retaliate to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV: Recycle)

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The user recycles a single-use item that has been used in battle so it can be used again.
flavor_text.platinum: The user recycles a single-use item that has been used in battle so it can be used again.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: The user recycles a single-use item that has been used in battle so it can be used again.
